Pork.name: Rosted Pork Chops
steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Season pork chops with salt, pepper, and thyme. Place in a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until no longer pink and juices run clear.
Pork.instructions: This is how you make Rosted Pork Chops

Pork.name: Pork Appetizer Meatballs
steps: Combine pork sausage and spicy pork sausage together in a bowl using your hands
Form mixture into meatballs, about 1 tablespoon each.
Fry meatballs in a skillet over medium heat until browned and completely cooked through, 15 to 20 minutes.
Pour orange juice concentrate into the skillet and stir to coat meatballs.
Put meatballs in a slow cooker and add the remaining orange juice concentrate; turn on Low setting to keep warm before serving.
Pork.instructions: This is how you make Pork Appetizer Meatballs

Pork.name: Onion Pan-Fried Pork Chops
ingredients: 1 ounce envelope dry onion soup mix
steps: Open the dry onion packet, and pour the mix into a shallow bowl. Stir in the flour.
Heat the oil in a heavy skillet over medium heat.
Coat pork chops in the onion soup mixture, and shake off the excess, Carefully place in the hot oil.
Turn chops over after about 30 seconds to quickly sear both sides. Cook for about 4 minutes per side.
Pork.instructions: This is how you make Onion Pan-Fried Pork Chops
Pork.description: This is Onion Pan-Fried Pork Chops

Pork.name: Cola-Glazed Ham
steps: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Line a 9x13-inch baking dish with aluminum foil.
Place brown sugar in a bowl; whisk in just enough cola to dissolve sugar and form a thick glaze.
Place ham in baking dish and pour glaze over ham. Add remaining cola to bottom of baking dish.
Bake ham in the preheated oven, basting with the glaze occasionally, for 2 hours.
Pork.instructions: This is how you make Cola-Glazed Ham

Pork.name: Grilled Mushrooms with Pork Bacon
steps: Preheat a grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate.
Clean and dry mushrooms. Wrap 1 strip of bacon around each mushroom and secure with a toothpick.
Place mushrooms on the preheated grill. Cook, turning often, until bacon is browned and crisp, about 10 minutes.
Pork.instructions: This is how you make Grilled Mushrooms with Pork Bacon
Pork.description: This is Grilled Mushrooms with Pork Bacon

Pork.name: Air Fryer Ranch Pork Chops
ingredients: 2 teaspoons dry ranch salad dressing mix
steps: Place pork chops on a plate and lightly spray both sides with cooking spray.
Sprinkle both sides with ranch seasoning mix and let sit at room temperature for 10 minutes.
preheat the air fryer to 390 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Place chops in the preheated air fryer,Cook for 5 minutes,
Flip chops and cook 5 minutes more. Let rest on a foil-covered plate for 5 minutes before serving.
Pork.instructions: This is how you make Air Fryer Ranch Pork Chops
Pork.description: This is Air Fryer Ranch Pork Chops

Pork.name: Sausage Casserole
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease the bottom of a baking dish with cooking spray.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir sausage in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes.
Drain and discard grease. Stir in cream cheese until combined.
Bake in the preheated oven for 5 minutes. Spread sausage mixture over baked crescent rolls
Continue baking until the top layer is golden brown, about 8 minutes.
Pork.instructions: This is how you make Sausage Casserole

Pork.name: Saucy Pork Chops
steps: In a bowl, mix the Italian-style salad dressing, soy sauce, and pepper.
Place the pork chops in a skillet over medium heat, and cover with the dressing mixture.
Cover skillet, and cook pork chops 25 minutes, turning occasionally.
Remove cover, reduce heat to low, and continue cooking to desired doneness
Pork.instructions: This is how you make Saucy Pork Chops

Pork.name: Brown Sugar Ham Steak
ingredients: 8 ounce bone-in fully cooked ham steak
steps: Cook ham steak in a large skillet over medium heat until browned, 3 to 4 minutes per side.
Remove ham from skillet; drain off any fat.
Melt butter in the same skillet over medium-low heat. Stir in brown sugar.
Return ham to skillet. Cook, turning ham often, until heated through and brown sugar has dissolved, about 10 minutes.
Pork.instructions: This is how you make Brown Sugar Ham Steak
Pork.description: This is Brown Sugar Ham Steak

Pork.name: Pork Chops braised in Beer
ingredients: 12 fluid ounce can or bottle beer
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a medium bowl, combine the ketchup, brown sugar and beer.
Mix well and pour into a 9x13 inch baking dish, Place the pork chops over this mixture in the dish.
Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour, rest for 10 minutes before serving.
Pork.instructions: This is how you make Pork Chops braised in Beer
Pork.description: This is Pork Chops braised in Beer

Chicken.name: Baked Chicken Breasts
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly butter a baking dish.
Stir together melted butter and salt in a bowl. Arrange chicken in the prepared baking dish.
Brush butter mixture onto chicken until thoroughly coated, pouring any extra over chicken.
Bake for 30-45 minutes in the preheated oven. Rest for 15 minutes before serving.
Chicken.instructions: This is how you make Baked Chicken Breasts

Chicken.name: Tender Italian Baked Chicken
steps: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
Stir together melted butter and salt in a bowl. Arrange chicken in the prepared baking dish.
Mix mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, and garlic powder together in a bowl. Place bread crumbs in a separate bowl.
Dip each chicken breast into the mayonnaise mixture, then into the bread crumbs to coat.
Arrange breaded chicken on a baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes
Chicken.instructions: This is how you make Tender Italian Baked Chicken
Chicken.description: This is Tender Italian Baked Chicken

Chicken.name: Grilled Chicken with Rosemary
steps: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat, and lightly oil the grate.
Sprinkle 1 teaspoon garlic powder on each chicken breast and season with salt and pepper.
Lay one rosemary sprig on each chicken breast.
Cook chicken breasts until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 8 minutes per side.
Chicken.instructions: This is how you make Grilled Chicken with Rosemary
Chicken.description: This is Grilled Chicken with Rosemary

Chicken.name: Cashew Crusted Chicken
steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Combine the preserves, mustard and curry powder in a large skillet and heat over low heat, stirring constantly
Place cashews in a shallow dish or bowl.
Dip chicken breasts in skillet sauce, then roll in nuts to coat and place in a lightly greased baked dish
Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 20 to 30 minutes. Rest for 10 minutes before serving
Chicken.instructions: This is how you make Cashew Crusted Chicken

Chicken.name: Pesto Cheesy Chicken Rolls
steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Spray a baking dish with cooking spray.
Spread 2 to 3 tablespoons of the pesto sauce onto each flattened chicken breast.
Place one slice of cheese over the pesto. Roll up tightly, and secure with toothpicks.
Bake uncovered for 45 to 50 minutes in the preheated oven.
Chicken.instructions: This is how you make Pesto Cheesy Chicken Rolls
Chicken.description: This is Pesto Cheesy Chicken Rolls

Chicken.name: Buffalo Chicken Lettuce Wraps
steps: Put chicken into the crock of a slow cooker for 7-8 hours
Stir cayenne pepper sauce and ranch dressing mix together in a bowl until smooth; pour over chicken.
Transfer chicken to a large bowl and use 2 forks to shred chicken into strands.
Bake uncovered for 45 to 50 minutes in the preheated oven.
Spoon chicken into lettuce leaves and roll lettuce around chicken.
Chicken.instructions: This is how you make Buffalo Chicken Lettuce Wraps
Chicken.description: This is Buffalo Chicken Lettuce Wraps

Chicken.name: Chicken and Mushrooms
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
8 ounces fresh mushrooms, sliced 1/4 inch thick
steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Season chicken on all sides with salt and ground black pepper.
Heat olive oil over medium-high heat.Add butter, Place chicken skin-side down in skillet and cook until browned, about 5 minutes.
Turn chicken over; stir mushrooms with a pinch of salt into skillet. Increase heat to high; cook, stirring mushrooms occasionally for 20 minutes.
Transfer chicken breasts and mushrooms to a plate and loosely tent with foil; set aside.
Chicken.instructions: This is how you make Chicken and Mushrooms

Chicken.name: Salsa Chicken
steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Place chicken breasts in the prepared dish. Sprinkle seasoning mix on both sides of chicken breasts; pour salsa on top.
Bake until chicken is tender and juicy and the juices run clear, 25 to 35 minutes.
Sprinkle chicken evenly with cheese and serving
Chicken.instructions: This is how you make Salsa Chicken

Chicken.name: Chicken Wrapped in Bacon
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Pound chicken slices until they are even in thickness and about 1/4-inch thick then season
Place 2 bacon slices side by side on a work surface. Place each chicken roll at one end of bacon slices and roll bacon around chicken; secure with toothpicks.
Heat a skillet to medium-high heat and cook bacon-wrapped chicken rolls in the hot skillet until the bacon is browned and crisp, 4 to 5 minutes per side.
Transfer chicken rolls to preheated oven for 25-35 minutes
Chicken.instructions: This is how you make Chicken Wrapped in Bacon
Chicken.description: This is Chicken Wrapped in Bacon

Chicken.name: Baked Orange Chicken
steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
In a small bowl, combine orange juice and soy sauce. Pour 1/4 cup marinade into a shallow dish; add chicken and turn to coat.
Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour. Cover and refrigerate remaining marinade.
Drain and discard marinade. Place chicken and reserved marinade in an 8-in baking tray coated with cooking spray.
Transfer chicken to preheated oven for 25-35 minutes
Chicken.instructions: This is how you make Baked Orange Chicken

Beef.name: Beef Ravioli Lasagna
ingredients: 1 package (25 ounces) frozen sausage or cheese ravioli
steps: In a large skillet, cook and crumble beef over medium heat until no longer pink, 5-7 minutes; drain.
baking dish, layer a third of the spaghetti sauce, half of the ravioli and beef, and 1/2 cup cheese; repeat layers. Top with remaining sauce and cheese.
Cover and bake at 400° until heated through, 40-45 minutes.
Beef.instructions: This is how you make Beef Ravioli Lasagna

Beef.name: Black Bean and Beef Tostadas
ingredients: 1 can diced tomatoes and green chiles
steps: In a large skillet, cook and crumble beef over medium heat until no longer pink, 5 minutes
Stir in tomatoes; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, until liquid is almost evaporated, 6-8 minutes and Stir in black beans
To serve, spread refried beans over tostada shells. Top with beef mixture; add toppings as desired.
Beef.instructions: This is how you make Black Bean and Beef Tostadas
Beef.description: This is Black Bean and Beef Tostadas

Beef.name: Tomato Hamburger Soup
ingredients: 1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup
steps: In a 5-qt. slow cooker, combine the first 5 ingredients. Cover and cook on high for 4-5 hours or until heated through. Season with salt and pepper.
Beef.instructions: This is how you make Tomato Hamburger Soup

Beef.name: Mexican Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: 5.4 ounces Mexican-style rice and pasta mix
steps: Preheat oven to 375°. In a large skillet, cook and crumble beef over medium heat until no longer pink, 5-7 minutes; drain.
Stir in tomatoes, rice mix and water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer, covered, until liquid is absorbed, 6-8 minutes.
Cut and discard tops from peppers; remove seeds. Place peppers in a greased 13x9-in. baking dish.
Place 1/3 cup beef mixture in each pepper; sprinkle each with 2 tablespoons cheese. Top with remaining rice mixture. Bake, covered, 25 minutes.
Sprinkle with remaining 1 cup cheese. Bake, uncovered, until cheese is melted.
Beef.instructions: This is how you make Mexican Stuffed Peppers

Beef.name: Burger Americana
steps: In a large bowl, combine bread crumbs, egg, salt and pepper. Add beef; mix lightly but thoroughly. Shape into four 1/2-in.-thick patties
Brush both sides of patties with oil. Grill burgers, covered, over medium heat or broil 4 in. from heat 4-5 minutes on each side.
Rest for 10 minutes and serve on buns with desired toppings.
Beef.instructions: This is how you make Burger Americana

Beef.name: Pizza Roll-Ups
steps: In a large skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink; drain. Remove from the heat.
Add the tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese and oregano.
Separate crescent dough into 8 rectangles, pinching seams together. Place about 3 tablespoons of meat mixture along 1 long side of each rectangle.
Roll up, jelly-roll style, starting with a long side. Cut each roll into 3 pieces.
Place, seam side down, 2 in. apart on greased baking sheets. Bake at 375° for 15 minutes
Beef.instructions: This is how you make Pizza Roll-Ups

Beef.name: Asian Beef and Noodles
ingredients: 2 cups frozen broccoli stir-fry vegetable blend
steps: In a large skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink; drain. Remove from the heat.
Add the contents of 1 ramen noodle flavoring packet; stir until dissolved. Remove beef and set aside.
In the same skillet, combine the water, vegetables, ginger, noodles and contents of remaining flavoring packet. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat
simmer until noodles are tender, 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Return beef to the pan and heat through. Stir in onion.
Beef.instructions: This is how you make Asian Beef and Noodles
Beef.description: This is Asian Beef and Noodles

Beef.name: Beefy Tortellini Skillet
steps: In a large skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink; drain.
Stir in steak seasoning. Add water and bouillon; bring to a boil. Stir in tortellini; return to a boil.
Reduce heat; simmer, covered, 3-4 minutes or until tortellini are tender.
Remove from heat; sprinkle with cheese. Let stand, covered, until cheese is melted.
Beef.instructions: This is how you make Beefy Tortellini Skillet

Beef.name: Beef Burritos
steps: Preheat oven to 375°. In a small bowl, mix enchilada sauce and salsa verde.
In a large skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink, 8-10 minutes, breaking into crumbles; drain. Stir in 1/2 cup sauce mixture.
Spoon 2/3 cup beef mixture across center of each tortilla; top each with 3 tablespoons cheese. Fold bottom and sides of tortilla over filling and roll up.
Bake, uncovered, until cheese is melted, 10-15 minutes.
Beef.instructions: This is how you make Beef Burritos

Beef.name: Creamy Beef & Potatoes
ingredients: 2 cans condensed cream of mushroom soup
steps: Place potatoes and water in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave, covered, on high until tender, 8-10 minutes, stirring twice.
Meanwhile, in a oven, cook beef, breaking into crumbles, over medium heat until no longer pink, 6-8 minutes; drain.
Stir in salt and pepper. In a small bowl, whisk soup and milk until blended; add to beef.
Stir in potatoes. Sprinkle with cheese. Reduce heat to low; cook, covered, until cheese is melted.
Beef.instructions: This is how you make Creamy Beef & Potatoes

Veggie.name: Smoked Cheese Ravioli
steps: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a rolling boil over high heat; stir in the frozen ravioli and return to a boil.
Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the ravioli float to the top and the filling is hot, 6 to 8 minutes. Drain.
Meanwhile, bring the half-and-half to a simmer in a saucepan over medium heat. Whisk in the Gouda cheese until melted
Season with parsley and white pepper. Pour the sauce over the cooked ravioli to serve.
Veggie.instructions: This is how you make Smoked Cheese Ravioli

Veggie.name: Chickpea Tacos
steps: Place chickpeas in a saucepan over medium heat. Add water and taco seasoning. Cook and stir until thoroughly heated, 5 to 7 minutes.
Remove from heat. Mash mixture to crush chickpeas, Divide chickpea filling evenly among taco shells.
Veggie.instructions: This is how you make Chickpea Tacos

Veggie.name: Spaghetti Cacio e Pepe
steps: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti in boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
eat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir garlic and pepper in hot oil until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes.
Add cooked spaghetti and Pecorino Romano cheese.Ladle in 1/2 cup reserved cooking water; stir until cheese is melted, about 1 minute.
Stir in more cooking water as needed, 1 tablespoon at a time, until sauce coats spaghetti, about 1 minute more.
Veggie.instructions: This is how you make Spaghetti Cacio e Pepe
Veggie.description: This is Spaghetti Cacio e Pepe

Veggie.name: Eggplant Pasta
ingredients: 1 eggplant, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 can plum tomatoes with juice, chopped
steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir garlic until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes
Add eggplant; cook, stirring constantly, until eggplant is softened, about 5 minutes.
Add tomatoes and juice; cook until sauce is slightly reduced, about 20 minutes.
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook rigatoni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 13 minutes.
Drain Pasta, Pour sauce over pasta and serve.
Veggie.instructions: This is how you make Eggplant Pasta

Veggie.name: Roasted Cauliflower
steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.
Place the cauliflower onto a cutting board with the stem side facing upwards; cut vertically into 4 steaks approximately even in thickness.
Arrange slices onto the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle olive oil over the steaks; season with garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.
Roast in preheated oven for 20 minutes, turn with a spatula, and continue to roast until soft in the middle and darkening around the edges, about 15 minutes more.
Veggie.instructions: This is how you make Roasted Cauliflower

Veggie.name: Broccoli Noodles and Cheese Casserole
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes
Steam broccoli until bright green and tender, 5 to 10 minutes. Combine broccoli, pasta and cottage cheese in 2 quart baking dish; mix well.
Sprinkle pasta mixture with Cheddar cheese and bake for 8 to 10 minutes, until cheese is bubbly.
Veggie.instructions: This is how you make Broccoli Noodles and Cheese Casserole
Veggie.description: This is Broccoli Noodles and Cheese Casserole

Veggie.name: Mexican Quinoa
steps: Bring water and quinoa to a boil in a saucepan. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender and water is absorbed, 15 to 20 minutes.
Place vegetable blend in a microwave-safe bowl; microwave until heated through, about 5 minutes. Stir vegetable blend into quinoa.
Veggie.instructions: This is how you make Mexican Quinoa

Veggie.name: Curried Carrot Soup
steps: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat. Saute onion until tender and translucent. Stir in the curry powder.
Add the chopped carrots, and stir until the carrots are coated. Pour in the vegetable broth, and simmer until the carrots are soft, about 20 minutes.
Transfer the carrots and broth to a blender, and puree until smooth. Pour back into the pot, and thin with water to your preferred consistency.
Veggie.instructions: This is how you make Curried Carrot Soup

Veggie.name: Tomato Bagel Sandwich
steps: Spread cream cheese on bagel halves. Top cream cheese with tomato slices. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Top with fresh basil leaves.
Veggie.instructions: This is how you make Tomato Bagel Sandwich

Veggie.name: Tomato Bagel Sandwich
steps: Spread cream cheese on bagel halves. Top cream cheese with tomato slices. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Top with fresh basil leaves.
Veggie.instructions: This is how you make Tomato Bagel Sandwich

Veggie.name: Mediterranean Pesto Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Spread pesto onto each pita; top with feta cheese, tomatoes, and Kalamata olives. Place each pita onto a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted, 6 to 8 minutes then serve.
Veggie.instructions: This is how you make Mediterranean Pesto Pizza
